newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Bank Indonesia money policy temporarily neutral.
newsitem.headline: Bank Indonesia money policy temporarily neutral.

text.p: Indonesia's central bank, Bank Indonesia, was temporarily neutral on Wednesday morning in its money policy, money traders said.

Some 248 billion rupiah of central bank certificates (SBIs) due today exceeded slightly some 182 billion rupiah of maturing short-term securities (SBPUs) and some 20 billion rupiah of SBIs to be settled today -- Jakarta newsroom +6221 384-6364.
